mapper.insert: insert into t_dept (id, `name`, introduction, stutas, `Number`, opflag, opdate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_dept
id,
`name`,
introduction,
stutas,
`Number`,
opflag,
opdate,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{opflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_dept
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stutas = #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`Number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opflag = #{opflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opdate = #{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_dept set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stutas = #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opflag = #{opflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opdate = #{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select d.id, d.`name`,j.id Jobs_id, j.`name` Jobs_name from t_dept d inner join t_jobs j on d.id = j.dept
select d.id, d.`name`,count(t.type) task_content,t.type task_type from t_dept d inner join t_task t on d.id = t.dept where t.Audit_status != '0' group by d.`name`,t.type
select d.id, d.`name`,t.id task_id,t.name task_name,t.progress task_progress from t_dept d inner join t_task t on d.id = t.dept where t.Audit_status != '0' group by d.`name`,t.name
